drop.desc: An open-source game distribution platform built for speed, flexibility and beauty.

add.desc: Drop couldn't add this game to your library: {0}
add.title: Failed to add game to library

delete.desc: Drop couldn't add delete this source: {0}

errors.occurred: An error occurred while responding to your request. If you believe this to be a bug, please report it. Try signing in and see if it resolves the issue.

delete.desc: Drop encountered an error while deleting the version: {error}
delete.title: There an error while deleting the version

order.desc: Drop encountered an error while updating the version: {error}

admin.description: Manage the users on your Drop instance, and configure your authentication methods.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Drop supports a variety of "authentication mechanisms". As you enable or disable them, they are shown on the sign in screen for users to select from. Click the dot menu to configure the authentication mechanism.

simple.title: Simple authentication
simple.description: Simple authentication uses a system of 'invitations' to create users. You can create an invitation, and optionally specify a username or email for the user, and then it will generate a magic URL that can be used to create an account.
simple.inviteDescription: Drop will generate a URL that you can send to the person you want to invite. You can optionally specify a username or email for them to use.
simple.inviteEmailDescription: Must be in the format user{'@'}example.com
simple.inviteAdminSwitchDescription: Create this user as an administrator

admin.detectedGame: Drop has detected you have new games to import.
admin.detectedVersion: Drop has detected you have new verions of this game to import.

version.noAdv: No advanced options for this configuration.
version.setupDesc: Ran once when the game is installed
version.setupModeDesc: When enabled, this version does not have a launch command, and simply runs the executable on the user's computer. Useful for games that only distribute installer and not portable files.
version.umuOverrideDesc: By default, Drop uses a non-ID when launching with UMU Launcher. In order to get the right patches for some games, you may have to manually set this field.
version.updateModeDesc: When enabled, these files will be installed on top of (overwriting) the previous version's. If multiple "update modes" are chained together, they are applied in order.

version.noVersions: You have no versions of this game available.

game.imageCarouselDescription: Customise what images and what order are shown on the store page.
game.imageCarouselEmpty: No images added to the carousel yet.
game.imageLibraryDescription: Please note all images uploaded are accessible to all users through browser dev-tools.

sources.createDesc: Drop will use this source to access your game library, and make them available.
sources.desc: Configure your library sources, where Drop will look for new games and versions to import.
sources.fsDesc: Imports games from a path on disk. Requires version-based folder structure, and supports archived games.
sources.fsPathDesc: An absolute path to your game library.
sources.nameDesc: The name of your source, for reference.
sources.typeDesc: The type of your source. Changes the required options.

admin.subheader: As you add folders to your library sources, Drop will detect it and prompt you to import it. Each game needs to be imported before you can import a version.
admin.title: Libraries

collection.createDesc: Collections can used to organise your games and find them more easily, especially if you have a large library.
collection.subheader: Add a new collection to organize your games
collection.title: Collection

library.subheader: Organize your games into collections for easy access, and access all your games.

scheduled.cleanupInvitationsDescription: Cleans up expired invitations from the database to save space.
scheduled.cleanupObjectsDescription: Detects and deletes unreferenced and unused objects to save space.
scheduled.cleanupSessionsDescription: Cleans up expired sessions to save space and ensure security.
scheduled.checkUpdateDescription: Check if Drop has an update.

article.editorGuide: Use the shortcuts above or write Markdown directly. Supports **bold**, *italic*, [links](url), and more.

news.subheader: Stay up to date with the latest updates and announcements.
news.title: Latest News
